item.description:
STEPTEMBER CONTINUES...

The Original Steppers of Boston 2006 Inc. Invite you to attend a Brunch and Steppin Afterset
Mix and mingle with Sarah

Location: Rudi's Resto + Cafe
811 Mass Av
Boston, MA

11:30am - 12:45pm

NEW INFO (as of 9/16/10)

Cost: Dutch Treat. Order off the menu

1pm STEPPIN SET after the BRUNCH is $10

SEATING: Weather permitting outdoors available


ATTIRE - Steppin Tee Shirts

IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING:

1pm to 4pm

STEPtember to Remember

VERVE LOUNGE
Non Stop Steppin
Step off brunch
Mix, mingle and step with Sarah before she departs for Atlanta





Parking Hampton Inn Hotel 2 hour validation
Enter off Harrison Av

BMC Parking garage located at 710 Albany Street $5.00 for the day

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: STEPtember Brunch (Dutch Treat) and Steppin After Set with guest Sarah Teagle
